SHIRAZ S/O.HUSSAIN KOYA, 2F, SYLAVAN HEIGHTSM KADAVANTHRA, KANAYANNUR TALUK, ERNAKULAM- 695001. 3. SAINUL ABDEEN SHA S/O.KUNJUMON, AMBALATH VEETIL HOUSE, KURUBILAVU VILLAGE, THRISSUR. R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR:SRI AMJAD ALI THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 10-01-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Ie: fae Be aa Bla 2017/KER/1229 Cr1.MC.No. 195 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER (S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al: TRUE COPY OF THE CERTIFICATE OF REGISTRATION. ANNEXURE A16: TRUE COPY OF THE RECEIPT DT.3/10/2016. ANNEXURE A17: TRUE COPY OF FORM NO.29. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS :NIL True Copy / P A to Judge neva 2017/KER/1229 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Crl.M.C.No.195 of 2017 Dated this the 10 day of January, 2017 ORDER The main grievance of the petitioner is that the application for interim custody is not being considered and disposed of by the learned magistrate. I find no reason as to why the court below should delay the consideration of the application, having regard to the fact that a vehicle is involved and each day's delay may result in further deterioration of its value. Court below shall take up the matter and dispose it of at the earliest. Crl.M.C is disposed of as above. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS Judge Sbna/10/1/17 True Copy / P A to Judge
